RECORD.TEXT: CMC 82863580 DIS Admission Date : 10/08/1994 Discharge Date : 10/18/1994 The patient was scheduled for discharge to rehab . It was noted on 10/8/94 that she had a decreased range of motion in both her knees with flexion to approximately 40 degrees with maximum physical therapy . It was decided to postpone her discharge to rehab and take her back to the operating room for a manipulation under anesthesia . NA BENGSTEN , M.D , HM72 Attending : LUPEVICKETTE L.
